Title: A meal for Rs. 10? Unbelievable, but true
Content: At lunchtime, the environs of Shreeramapete in the heart of Sullia town are abuzz with the voice of students; not because they have some outdoor activity, but because they are going to or coming back
Author: Anil Kumar Sastry
Description: At lunchtime, the environs of Shreeramapete in the heart of Sullia town are abuzz with the voice of students; not because they have some outdoor activity, but because they are going to or coming back
